### Population Data
We used data that was aquired from
[this](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Demographic_history_of_the_United_States#Historical_population) wikipedia page. This data was aquired from a document from the Federal Census Bureau in 2004 (p. 1168).
Click [here](http://www2.census.gov/prod2/statcomp/documents/CT1970p2-13.pdf) for the link to that document.
We also used data from [here](https://fusiontables.google.com/DataSource?dsrcid=225439#rows:id=1)
